content:
Welcome to the mod manager!
There are 4 tabs:
- \c[3]Online\c[0] - Search through all availible mods.
- \c[3]Selected\c[0] - Mods you selected to install.
- \c[3]Enabled\c[0] - Mods that are installed and enabled.
- \c[3]Disabled\c[0] - Mods that are installed and disabled.
Select the mod sort method by pressing \i[help3].
If a mod title has a list icon (\i[quest]) before it, that means it has availible in the online repositories, and if it has a question mark (\i[lore-others]), that means that it's not.
If a mod title has a clock (\i[stats-general]) before it, that means it's awaiting a restart.
If a mod title has a news icon (\i[item-news]) before it, that means it has an update availible.
Press \i[menu] to open the filters menu.
See the next pages for explanation of seperate tabs.

pages.title: \c[3]Mod Manager - Online\c[0]
content:
The \c[3]Online\c[0] tab contains all availible mods you can install.
To select or deselect a mod for installation, focus a mod and press \i[key-throw] or \i[gamepad-a].
Install mods by pressing \i[help4].

pages.title: \c[3]Mod Manager - Selected\c[0]
content:
The \c[3]Selected\c[0] tab contains all mods selected for installation.
Selected mods have yellow names.
To select or deselect a mod for installation, focus a mod and press \i[key-throw] or \i[gamepad-a].
Install mods by pressing \i[help4].

pages.title: \c[3]Mod Manager - Enabled\c[0]
content:
The \c[3]Enabled\c[0] tab contains all installed and enabled mods.
Enabled mods have green names.
Uninstall mods by pressing \i[help2].
To disable a mod, focus a mod and press \i[key-throw] or \i[gamepad-a].

pages.title: \c[3]Mod Manager - Disabled\c[0]
content:
The \c[3]Disabled\c[0] tab contains all installed and disabled mods.
Disabled mods have red names.
Uninstall mods by pressing \i[help2].
To enable a mod, focus a mod and press \i[key-throw] or \i[gamepad-a].

areYouSureYouWantTo: Are you sure you want to:
areYouSureYouWantToUninstall:
Are you sure you want to uninstall the mod:
- \c[3][modName]\c[0]
cannotUninstall: Cannot uninstall the mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] because other mods depend on it:
updatesDetected: Some mods have a new version. Do you want to update now?
askRestartInstall:
Installed succesfully.
The installed mods will start working after a restart.
Do you want to restart?
askRestartUninstall:
Uninstalled succesfully.
The mod will actually stop working after a restart.
Do you want to restart?
modStatesChanged:
Mod states have been changed, they will take effect after a game restart.
Do you want to restart now?
cannotDisable: Cannot disable the mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] because other mods depend on it:
doYouWantToEnable:
The mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] depends on these disabled mods:
[mods]Do you also want to enable them?
cannotDisableDisabled: Disabling the mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] is not allowed.
cannotUninstallDisabled: Uninstalling the mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] is not allowed.
cannotUninstallGit: Uninstalling the mod: \c[3][modName]\c[0] is not allowed because it is a git repository.
enableAutoUpdatePrompt: Enable auto update prompt on startup

gridView.name: Grid view
gridView.description: Makes the mod list a grid

hideLibrary.name: Hide library mods
hideLibrary.description: Hides mods that don't add any new content themselvs

tagQol.name: QoL
tagQol.description: stands for "Quality of Life". Makes the playing experience smoother

tagPlayerCharacter.name: player character
tagPlayerCharacter.description: adds new playable characters and/or classes

tagPartyMember.name: party member
tagPartyMember.description: adds new playable characters and/or classes

tagPuzzle.name: puzzle
tagPuzzle.description: adds new puzzles or something puzzle related

tagCosmetic.name: cosmetic
tagCosmetic.description: adds any kind of cosmetic things like skins, pets or menu skins

tagCheats.name: cheats
tagCheats.description: do things you"re not supposed to do like spawn items or infinite gold

tagSpeedrun.name: speedrun
tagSpeedrun.description: helps speedrunners with speedruns or practise

tagWidget.name: widget
tagWidget.description: adds a CCUILib quick menu widget
